item.name: Satellite requests access token from itself

urlencoded.description: Copies Satellite's own client_assertion from pre-request script
Id of party doing the request (Self- EU.EORI.NLTESTPIRSAT1)

request.description:
Requests an access token from the Scheme Owner, to be used for accessing Scheme Owner services.
Contains a pre-request script that creates a client_assertion via the iSHARE Testing function /generate-jws, to be used for testing purposes only.
After successfully receiving the access token, it's value is stored as a global variable to be used for all other Scheme Owner services.

exec: //to decode the response (output in console) when received as JWT.

var parts = a.split('.'); // header, payload, signature
//print the decodedData to console to see the structure

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: Only used for testing and in test/dev environments

request.description:
Requests an access token from the Scheme Owner, to be used for accessing Scheme Owner services.
Contains a pre-request script that creates a client_assertion via the iSHARE Testing function /generate-jws, to be used for testing purposes only.
After successfully receiving the access token, it's value is stored as a global variable to be used for all other Scheme Owner services.
